content: cricket s v_stitch infinity scarf is quick and easy and very satisfying when you need to work something up last minute for a gift or just need a break from your larger wips this infinity scarf is the way to go i am in full holiday gift spirit and this year it is all about the scarves i have made some simple double_crochet scarves for the girls and some half_double_crochet scarves for the guys all in solid colours so these v_stitch multicoloured scarves really work up nicely and are great splashes of colour you only need 1 skein of yarn to complete this project if you use the recommended yarn and follow the instructions but feel free to go bigger and use two skeins if using different kinds of yarn you may want to make sure you have 2 balls have fun and please share your creations with me
